page.title: 13 RELIGION
page.content: There are two non-conformists chapels in our block,both situated at Swyddffynnon.The Methodist chapel has 24 members,10 of which attend regularly;and the Baptist chapel has 12 members-6 of these attend regularly.One service per Sunday is held at both,the Baptist usually in the morning and the Methodist in the evening.Neither holds a Sunday School. Each has its own minister,and both form part of a collection of chapels which both ministers are responsible for.This year for the first time ever, both chapels united for the annual thanksgiving service to ensure a good gathering.It was held at the Methodist chapel in October.Next year will be the Baptist's turn.None of the English people attend the services at these 2 chapels,therefore they are always held in Welsh.
